name: Santa's worst Christmas
description:
Santa's worst Christmas is a game produced in 3 days and a half during the Chrismas Unreal Jam 2021 and made by 8 IIM students from different classes.

In this festive solo game, you will have to break into the mall at night in order to pick up as much toys as you can! However, you will have to be quick because you can not stay there for years and night guards will pay attention of any movement you make ... Do not get caught ...

Your ability to think and your reflexes will be challenged on each courses so stay focused and save Santa from the bad buzz!

GAME FEATURES

  • A dynamic gameplay accessible to all 
  • Try to do your best thanks to the great replayability of the game 
  • Discover a christmas themed spooky atmosphere 

GAMEPLAY

Use Z/Q/S/D to run among the mall and press left click right in time to pick up the presents.

THE TEAM

  • Antoine Dirion - Game Programmer
  • Arthur Cablé - Game Designer
  • Julien D'arco - Game art
  • Liam Alliaume-Desnoues - Game Producer

  • Quentin Guerif - Game Designer
  • Romain Habib - Game Programmer
  • Silouane Parent - Game Designer
